hymn.title: God is So Good to Me!

layout.singingstanza: Our God is so good! God is so good! God is so good, He's so good to me!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2012 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Our God is so good! God is so good!
God is so good, He's so good to me!
The sun gives us light, warms us just right.
The moon shining bright lights up the night.
The stars stay right where God put them there.
The earth turns and tips on yearly trips
God planned it this way: night and then day!
